author: collectormom
title: Lego Club Max
review: This is Max, the Lego Club mascot. This key chain is available March 4-5 to Club Members free with a purchase of $35 or more. The item number included on the March store calendar is 852856, code 4610386. I wonder if that means you can use the item number for an online purchase?

author: michaelvader
title: MAX!
review:
The day has come when lego made a Max minifig! So if you have read my other key chain reviews you might know that I cut off the key chain part to make it a minifig, And that is what I did to Max. Ok I am going to make the review based on the parts.

 

Hair: This is the best piece of all, the brand new lego Max hair piece! I really like all the detail they put into this piece. ( If you take the key chain thing off it will make a hole in there but you can not see it from the front which is good). Overall: 5/5

 

Head: Ah never forget about the head. NEVER! Any way they could have made a better head I mean come on, That could be a girl head if you look at it close. But its OK. Overall: 4/5

Torso: THE ONE AND ONLY MAX TEE-SHIRT IS HERE! (lol) As you can probably tell I REALLY like the shirt. There is not much to say Though so Overall: 5/5

 

Legs: They are tan legs with the Max Pockets on the side thats all. Overall: 5/5

 

Overall with this set I have to give it a 5/5

 

Thanks for reading! Oh and I picked a 1 brick for buliding experience because there is no building experience.

author: benhjt
title: max keychain
review:
Its the mascot, Mr.Max

nothing much to say, this guy symbolizes the fun in building with lego, I kept this with my car key and he always hangs in front so everyone knows im a lego fan.
